actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill making emergency supplemental appropriations for nutrition and supportive services for older Native Americans under the Older Americans Act of 1965.
short_title: Supplemental Services for Native Elders Act
subjects: Department of Health and Human Services

summary.text:
Supplemental Services for Native Elders Act

This bill provides FY2020 emergency supplemental appropriations to the Department of Health and Human Services for nutrition and supportive services for older Native Americans.

titles.title: Supplemental Services for Native Elders Act
Supplemental Services for Native Elders Act
A bill making emergency supplemental appropriations for nutrition and supportive services for older Native Americans under the Older Americans Act of 1965.
